name: Secret Dimension (Early Access 0.2)
description:
Secret Dimension is a sci-fi horror game currently under development by one person, the game will feature the theme of traveling through a different universe, where past and preset are colided to each other, with paradoxes and strange events happening. Alpha version shown the survival concept for the multiplayer version, where you will have to survive as long as you can against hordes of enemy!

The version of the game is currently in 0.2 for future release is planned to add more enemy and multiplayer function!
